item.description: We are conducting conference calls on skype a week after our regular, physical meeting. The topic is exactly the topic of the previous physical meeting (continued). This is a good opportunity to carry on the discussion with newer ideas, a nice venue for couple of out of townees to enable them to participate. To join the e-mail list of the participants of the skype chats please send an e-mail with your skype id and e-mail address to the organizer. You will receive the e-mails circulated amongst skype chat participants and after that all you have to do is to be on skype at the time of the meetings and the organizer will call you.
item.name: Skype chat
